page.title: 08CRYSTAL SPRINGS FARM (2)
page.content: Herd of 50 Jersey cows(no bull at present) uses A.I. Milked in cubicle parlour. Rears own herd replacement. Introduces Limousin for beef. 40 ewes & lambs. Feeds 20-30 pigs to pork weight. Skimmed milk is fed to pigs. Sells Jersey cream to local shops,tea- rooms & cafes. Sells pigs & lambs after butchering in Brailsford to cust -omers for deep freezing. Free range hens & ducks. Milk is collected by tanker by Northern Dairies Nottingham. Large shed to house cows in winter. Calves de-horned at 3-6wks old. Local anaesthetic applied -hot iron cauter- ises hornbud. Burns wood to heat house Has electricity,septic tank & weekly dustbin collection
